meanings.definition: Modify (something) to suit a particular individual or task.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys customizing her phone case with different stickers.
meanings.sent2: He is customizing his car to make it unique.
meanings.sent3: Customizing her outfit for the party made her feel confident.
meanings.sent4: His customizing of the software turned it into a powerful tool.
meanings.sent5: The artist was customizing the painting with intricate details.

meanings.definition: The action of modifying something to suit a particular individual or task.
meanings.sent1: Customizing requires attention to detail and creativity.
meanings.sent2: The customizing of the website was done by a skilled designer.
meanings.sent3: The customizing of the cake for the event was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: Her customizing of the presentation impressed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The customizing of the room layout made it more functional.
